name: Hill Valley Courthouse
description: The nascent Hill Valley Courthouse, a sturdy stone edifice still very much under construction, yet already projecting an air of grim authority. Its unfinished facade, raw stone and scaffolding reaching towards the sky, hints at a future testament to frontier law and order. Dust and the clang of hammers fill the air, mingling with the scent of fresh-cut timber and the faint, metallic tang of ambition. Even in its incomplete state, it's a place where the promise of justice, or at least a reckoning, is slowly being chiseled into being.
